Text.Page:
All those ancient prophecies and long-dead gods won't do us any good if the {@LinkCreature:30#510#direpaw mandrills} keep tearing everything apart.

They've rampaged through the {@Rgn:30009$$Upper Archive}, but we must stop further damage so the researchers can continue with their work.

Reduce their numbers the way only you can, and then report to Decurion {@LinkCreature:230#1001$$Litherus} who's in charge of the {@Rgn:30008$$Lower Archive}.
I was starting to worry about those {@LinkCreature:30#510#direpaw mandrills}, and you solve the problem before I can lift a finger. That's what I call "anticipation."
